text: salam-eul wihan bog-eum-eulo geuligo olhgo geuleum-ui gijun-eulo lamadan dal-e kkulan-i gyesidoeeossnani geudal-e imhaneun neohoe moduneun dansig-eul hala geuleona byeongjung-igeona yeohaengjung-il gyeong-u neun daleun nallo daechehamyeon doenila ha nanim-eun neohoelo hayeogeum gochung-eul won chi anh-eusini geu iljeong-eul chaeugo neohoelo hayeogeum pyeon-uileul wonhasinila geuleomeulo neohuiege bog-eum-eul jusin hananimkke gyeongbaehamyeo gamsahala
